Mailing Address:

5526 W. 13400 S.
#352
Herriman UT 84096

"Each of you should give what you have decided in your heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver."
2 Corinthians 9:7 (NIV)

2017 Giving Statement

To view, print, or download your giving statement, follow the steps below. Remember, we are here to help!

  1. Login to your account.
  2. Select "My Profile".
  3. Select "Giving" on the left side of your screen.
  4. Adjust the dates to 1/1/2017 - 12/31/2017. (If your contributions do not appear, try changing the "Show For" drop down from your name to your family name or vise versa.)
  5. Print or download your giving statement from this screen.

Feel free to email Ashley Smith with any questions regarding your giving statement.
